dialogue.text: Sometimes I forget I ever struggled with it. Then I remember, and the remembering is sweet.

visual_elements.cafe_atmosphere: Afternoon bustle, others in various states
visual_elements.coffee_metaphor: Empty cup holding memory of warmth

psychological_notes: Complete integration shown through forgetting the struggle, then remembering with sweetness rather than pain. This demonstrates healed relationship with past suffering. Evan now serves as unconscious beacon for others still struggling.
philosophical_underpinning: Suffering transformed into compassion and wisdom
therapeutic_direction: Past pain metabolized into present understanding
